description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Chat' that provides a chat UI for user/AI interaction in a Snakes & Ladders game. It includes internal state management, imperative methods for taunting and resetting, and integrates with OpenAI's API to generate AI responses. The component also supports ref forwarding for external control.

methods.name: aiAddMessage
methods.description: Private method to send a user message to the OpenAI API, handle the response, and update chat messages. It assembles the payload with a system prompt and recent messages, manages loading/error states, and scrolls chat into view.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Handles sending user-typed messages from input field, updating chat history, invoking OpenAI API, and managing states.
